Package com.atakmap.android.toolbar

Class ToolbarBroadcastReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.atakmap.android.toolbar.ToolbarBroadcastReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable
    public class ToolbarBroadcastReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
implements Disposable
    Manages the current active tool bar based on intents received which request the active toolbar to change and calls to registerToolbar. Locks and unlocks the toolbar as other menus open.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.BroadcastReceiver
